CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND(TECH_Transmission__c ==1,TECH_Depart__c==1,TECH_Arrivee__c==1,TECH_Fin__c==1,Text(Status)=='Provisoire') , IMAGE("/resource/1582019118000/OT_PROVISOIRE?","Provisoire",20,130) , IF ( AND(TECH_Transmission__c ==1,TECH_Depart__c==1,TECH_Arrivee__c==1,TECH_Fin__c==1,Text(Status)<>'En cours') , IMAGE("/resource/1551965030000/OT_Retour?","Retour",20,130) , IF ( AND(TECH_Transmission__c ==1,TECH_Depart__c==1,TECH_Arrivee__c==1,TECH_Fin__c==1,Text(Status)=='En cours') , IMAGE("/resource/1551965007000/OT_Fin?","Fin",20,130) , IF ( AND(TECH_Transmission__c ==1,TECH_Depart__c==1,TECH_Arrivee__c==1,TECH_Fin__c==0) , IMAGE("/resource/1551964987000/OT_Arrivee?","Arrivee",20,130) , IF ( AND(TECH_Transmission__c ==1,TECH_Depart__c==1,TECH_Arrivee__c==0,TECH_Fin__c==0) , IMAGE("/resource/1551964926000/OT_Depart?","Depart",20,130) , IF ( AND(TECH_Transmission__c ==1,TECH_Depart__c==0,TECH_Arrivee__c==0,TECH_Fin__c==0) , IMAGE("/resource/1551964968000/OT_Transmission?","Transmission",20,130) , IMAGE("/resource/1551971810000/OT_Nouvelle?","Transmission",20,130) ) ) ) ) )
)
CustomField.label: Etape actuelle
